#Import libraries

```{r include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

#Import data

```{r include=FALSE}
df <- readxl::read_xlsx("/home/lab401/Desktop/tab input tool AMD.xlsx")
```

#Clean data

```{r}
names(df) <- make.names(tolower(names(df)))

df = df %>% 
  mutate(ci.or.standard    = word(string = or.standard, start = 3),
         or.standard       = as.numeric(word(string = or.standard, start = 2)),
         frequenza.pop.gen = as.numeric(word(string = frequenza.pop.gen, start = 2)),
         or.normalizzato   = as.numeric(word(string = or.normalizzato, start=2))) %>% 
  dplyr::select(gene, snps, genotipi, or.standard, ci.or.standard, everything())
```

#Export data

```{r}
xlsx::write.xlsx(df, file = "/home/lab401/Desktop/tab input tool AMD GOOD.xlsx")
```
